title: Murabito Desu Ga Nani Ka? - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Fantasy   Harem   Romance   Shounen   Supernatural
tags: Adapted to Manga   Beautiful Female Lead   Betrayal   Cheats   Childhood Friends   Dragons   Fantasy World   Game Elements   Goblins   Goddesses   Gore   Heroes   Level System   Loli   Magic Beasts   Male Protagonist   Overpowered Protagonist   Reincarnated in Another World   Ruthless Protagonist   Second Chance   Special Abilities   Sword And Magic   Weak to Strong   Yandere
author: Shiraishi Arata   白石新
description: Iijima Ryuuto was reincarnated into another world as Lute Macklen. The most appropriate occupation for his stature after reincarnation was a villager?! Even his house was just of a normal farmer and obviously poor. In this world where goblins and dragons exist, there was a lot of stories about adventurers and mages. However, here, the occupation of a person is greatly reflected in their status, Ryuuto could not really expect to be OP. This is a story about Ryuuto becoming the strongest, despite being a villager.>
